title: Assessing the internalization pathways of Cr–Fe–Ni nanoparticles in native Dittrichia viscosa naturally exposed to industrial atmospheric fallout
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,2693-2702
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00064A, Paper
Bouchra Belhaj Abdallah, Irene Andreu, Viridiana Perez, Byron D. Gates
Significant amounts of aerosolized Cr–Fe–Ni nanoparticles were detected in wild Dittrichia viscosa grown near steel manufacturing activities. Most of these nanoparticles were found on the plant shoots likely internalized via a foliar uptake process.
